author: USA TODAY, Grace Hauck, USA TODAY
title: More than 2,000 coronavirus patients have died in US
description: Cases have been reported in all 50 states, D.C., Puerto Rico, Guam and the U.S. Virgin Islands. New York has reported the most deaths.
content:
Got a minute? Here's how you can help slow the spread of Coronavirus COVID-19 in under 60 seconds.
USA TODAY
